com.psddev.cms.db

Class ImageTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
      • com.psddev.cms.db.ImageTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.DynamicAttributes, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag

    public class ImageTag
extends javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
implements javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.DynamicAttributes
    Equivalent to the HTML img tag where its src attribute may be set to a URL or a StorageItem object.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ImageTag.Builder
      Static utility class for building HTML 'img' tags and URLs edited by an ImageEditor.
      static class  ImageTag.Static

      • setSrc

        public void setSrc(Object src)
        Sets the source object, which may be either a URL or a Dari object.

      • setField

        @Deprecated
public void setField(String field)
        Deprecated. No replacement
        Sets the field that contains the image. If not set, the first field with type is used.

      • setEditor

        public void setEditor(Object object)
        Sets the name of the image editor to use.

      • setSize

        public void setSize(Object size)
        Sets the internal name of the image size to use.

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(String width)
        Sets the width. Note that this will override the width provided by the image size set with #setSize(String).

      • setHeight

        public void setHeight(String height)
        Sets the height. Note that this will override the height provided by the image size set with #setSize(String).

      • setCropOption

        public void setCropOption(Object cropOptionObject)
        Sets the crop option. Note that this will override the crop option provided by the image size set with #setSize(String).

      • setResizeOption

        public void setResizeOption(Object resizeOptionObject)
        Sets the resize option. Note that this will override the resize option provided by the image size set with #setSize(String).

      • setTagName

        public void setTagName(String tagName)

      • setSrcAttr

        public void setSrcAttr(String srcAttr)
        Overrides the default attribute (src) used to place the image URL. This is usually used in the conjunction with lazy loading scripts that copy the image URL from this attribute to the "src" attribute at some point after the page has loaded.

      • setHideDimensions

        public void setHideDimensions(Object hideDimensions)
        When set to true, suppresses the "width" and "height" attributes from the final HTML output.

      • setOverlay

        public void setOverlay(Object overlay)
